name: Wifi Passwords (root)
description: Retrieves saved names and passwords for wifi access points you have connected to in the past.   It is useful if you forget a password or if you accidentally clicked on Forget network in wifi settings. It can export credentials to text file for backup.  Note: - This app will not work without root access.  - It does not crack or generate any passwords.  - No private data is collected or transmitted. - It may / may not be compartible with your Operating System
